quest.name: Return from the Void
journal: Concern is writ plain upon Varshahn's face.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Even those part voidsent require rest, I imagine. And her own abode seems as good a place as any.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Unlike the Source, however, there is scant ambient aether for her to draw upon here...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: In her present state, Zero is easy prey for other voidsent. We must be on our guard.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Though so slow as to be nearly imperceptible, Zero's chest rises and falls in a steady rhythm...

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: How long do you suppose she will remain this way?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I haven't the faintest inkling, nor can I say whether the aether we can afford to share will be enough to awaken her.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: 'Twould be best to take her back with us to the Source. There, she would be guaranteed all she requires.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Zero cannot give her consent, but it seems we have no choice. The alternative would be to leave her here, defenseless.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Should she later desire it, we can bring her home.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Forename, might I ask you to hold on to Barbariccia's memoria? It may yet serve a purpose.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: Oh? What happened to her?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: You have business with Zero?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: We have a newcomer─a former minion of Barbariccia.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: Let her know when she wakes, will you?

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Barbariccia's minion...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Why not go and find this newcomer? So we have something to tell Zero, if nothing else.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Indeed...

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: May I trouble you to join me, Forename? With luck, we might learn something of Golbez.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Worry not, we will keep an eye on Zero. Go and meet this newcomer.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: When the leader falls, the minions pledge themselves to the enemy. There's no loyalty─only survival.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: This appears to be the newcomer.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04598
dialogue.text: <gasp> Y-You're the ones who felled Barbariccia!

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04598
dialogue.text: I-I won't make trouble. I-I'll obey. So please, let me stay!

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: If you would obey, then tell me all you know of Golbez.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04598
dialogue.text: Th-There isn't much I can tell. Only the archfiends are allowed into his domain, wherever it is. None but they know.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: I see... No better way to guard oneself than keeping one's location secret.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: How does Golbez communicate with his minions afield?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04598
dialogue.text: He has these...scepters? Staves? Whatever they are, he uses them to talk to those far away.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text:
Not unlike linkpearls, at least in function...
That will be all. My thanks for your cooperation.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: My thanks to you as well for affording me the time.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: I am satisfied, so let us rejoin the others and head home.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Vrtra has told all. Golbez goes to great lengths indeed to conceal his whereabouts.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: While I'm sure Nahbdeen has matters under control, I can't help but worry. Let's not keep them waiting.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04598
dialogue.text: Whenever Barbariccia moved her domain, some would get left behind. No such worries here.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: I trust you understand that once we leave the Thirteenth, we will not return until we are prepared to resume our search. Knowing this, are you ready to depart?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will not be able to freely return to the Thirteenth. Are you certain you wish to leave?

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Back to Troia, then, and thence home...

dialogue.name: MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Surname, we have been expecting you. If you would follow me, I will show you to the guest chambers.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Proceed to the Meghaduta guest chambers?

obj.n: A World with Light and Life
